channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- Privileged Access Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- Privileged Access Manager

item.title: CVE-2020-11846|2024-08-21T13:37:11.454Z -- opentext -- privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability found in OpenText Privileged Access Manager that issues a token. on successful issuance of the token, a cookie gets set that allows unrestricted access to all the application resources.Â This issue affects Privileged Access Manager before 3.7.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2020-11847|2024-08-21T13:38:44.228Z -- opentext -- privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: SSH authenticated user when access the PAM server can execute an OS command to gain the full system access using bash. This issue affects Privileged Access Manager before 3.7.0.1.
